body_html:
On macos, we have no official support for GPUs.
TensorRT is an nvidia library that accelerates inference on GPUs.

So I would say this is a strictly unsupported feature you are trying to use.
We will not be actively trying to patch this, or create a patch release for this. But it will be available when the patch ends up in the release.
Marking as community support.

Marking as community support.
body:
On macos, we have no official support for GPUs.
TensorRT is an nvidia library that accelerates inference on GPUs.

So I would say this is a strictly unsupported feature you are trying to use.
We will not be actively trying to patch this, or create a patch release for this. But it will be available when the patch ends up in the release.
Marking as community support.
